event.title: The Killers

location.street: Via della Palla 2, ang. Via Torino

event.description: In occasione della tappa italiana del loro tuor (esaurita da mesi), i Killers sono alla FNAC per firmare le copie del loro nuovo album, Day & Age.

event.title: The Killers
event.description:
UNICA DATA IN ITALIA

MARTEDI' 17 MARZO 2009
MILANO - MEDIOLANUMFORUM SOLD OUT!
Via G. Di Vittorio, 6 – Assago (Mi)

www.indipendente.com

Aperture porte Ore 19.00


Continua il momento magico dei The Killers, dopo il successo dell’album Day & Age (che ha già venduto oltre 2 milioni di copie) e del singolo Human (ancora tra i brani più suonati in radio), sono andati tutti esauriti i biglietti per il concerto milanese del 17 marzo al Forum.




Intanto la band raccoglie grandi riconoscimenti anche nei referendum di fine anno e conquista il premio di Miglior Band per i lettori del Guardian, e di disco dell’anno (oltre che miglior canzone e miglior video per Human) per quelli di Rolling Stone Usa.
Infine la stampa inglese riporta la notizia di una possibile futura collaborazione con Paul McCartney, dopo che Mc Cartney aveva assistito al concerto del novembre scorso alla Royal Albert Hall.

Il nuovo album Day & Age è stato prodotto da Stuart Price, una delle figure chiave della musica elettronica (Les Rhythmes Digitales) che aveva lavorato in precedenza coi The Killers in occasione del singolo “Don’t Shoot Me Santa” e su alcune canzoni della raccolta Sawdust, e già all’opera con Madonna e Missy Elliott.

Con i due album in studio precendenti (Hot Fuss del 2004, che contiene la mega hit Somebody Told Me, e Sam’s Town del 2006) e la raccolta Sawdust (che contiene B sides, e rarità tra cui una canzone con Lou Reed, Tranquillize) i The Killers hanno venduto oltre 11 milioni di album riuscendo a coniugare profilo critico e successo commerciale.
La band è stata headliner di alcuni dei più prestigiosi festival rock del mondo tra cui Glastonbury, Reading, Pukkelpop, e si è esibita anche in venue storiche come il Madison Square Garden e la Royal Albert Hall..



I Killers sono Brandon Flowers (voce), David Keuning (chitarra/tastiere), Mark Stoermer (basso) e Ronnie Vannucci (batteria).



Sito ufficiale:
www.thekillersmusic.com
www.myspace.com/thekillers



Il nuovo album Day & Age disponibile in tutti i negozi.

MEDIA PARTNERS:

www.myspace.com/indipendenteeventieproduzioni
info@indipendente.com

event.title: MTV Australia Awards

venue.name: Sydney Convention & Exhibition Centre, Darling Harbour

event.description:
Buckle up, because MTV's hottest awards show has returned!

That's right, the Vodafone MTV Australia Awards 2009 will be heating up your screens with appearances from the most sought after local and international talent and artists! Held at the boardwalk to the stars, aka the Sydney Convention and Exhibition Centre, Darling Harbour, on Friday, March 27, this year's Awards is already shaping up to be one hell of a night with news that one of the hottest rock acts on the planet, The Killers, are performing!

If that's not enough to whip you into a frenzy then check this. 'The Hills' starlet and 'It' girl Audrina Patridge will be hosting the Red Carpet, while for the first time EVER, you, our ever faithful partners in fanatical music lovin', will be able to choose the winners of all awards categories!

So pull your socks up and look sharp because voting will commence on Monday, February 23, 2009.

Viewers will be able to register and place their votes online at www.mtv.com.au/vodafonemtvawards, making them eligible to win a double pass to the Vodafone MTV Australia Awards 2009 every week until voting closes on Wednesday March 25th 2009. Users can also vote via sms at 191 MTV (688).

If you want to be part of the of the international television broadcast of the Vodafone MTV Australia Awards 2009 then click here to get to Ticketek and nab your tickets!

The entire $50 ticket price will be donated to the Australian Red Cross Victorian Bushfire Appeal, so not only are you purchasing an amazing night out, you are also helping to mobilise the power of humanity.

Check out the category nominations below, and happy voting!

More announcements to come in the following weeks, so keep it locked.

The Vodafone MTV Australia Awards 2009 will broadcast live from the Sydney Convention and Exhibition Centre, Darling Harbour, on MTV Australia, Friday March 27, 7:30pm (AEST) Red Carpet, 8:30pm (AEST) main show.

event.title: The Killers
event.description:
SHAME! IT GOT CANCELED!

After much anticipation and speculation, The Killers will be returning to NZ this year to play their very first arena dates in Auckland and Christchurch in support of their incredible third album, Day & Age, out now on Island Records. Tickets for this show will go on-sale to the general public on Friday 30 January.

The Killers first NZ performance was well remembered after they boosted the star lineup at the Big Day Out in 2007. They wowed audiences across Australasia and their imminent return has been hopeful ever since. Now, thankfully, that time has come!

These days The Killers' live show has taken on new dimensions thanks to the brilliant songs found on Day & Age. The album, which sold over a million copies worldwide in its first week of release, sees The Killers expanding their sound into new territories with tremendous results. Day & Age is The Killers at their very best.

ITS CANCELED

event.description:
Timetable :D
http://flickr.com/photos/36164928@N05/3343603446/sizes/o/

event.title: V Festival 09 Perth
event.description:
AUSTRALIA! V FESTIVAL is back!

Three is indeed a magic number, and having reached our third anniversary with ease and panache V Festival will again mark out our turf in late March when we present our four Aussie events in Sydney, on the Gold Coast, and in Melbourne and Perth.

And all this, thanks to our blood brothers, Virgin Mobile - who, like us, consider Australia's V Festival fix a matter of national importance.

Since we last reached out and touched you, the Australian party going public has been bamboozled by a plethora of 'new' start up festivals.

Fear not!

We will not compromise quality and we refuse to tighten our belt. Instead we've decided to pull out all the stops and deliver you the mother load of line-ups for 2009, featuring some of the most exciting names on the international live circuit in a musical jambalaya of icons and innovators.

So before you have another sleepless night, it is our absolute pleasure to serve to you up a tasting plate of our lineup.

With more synth-laden hooks than an angling store and the mesmeric charms of front man Brandon Flowers comes Las Vegas's The Killers, sure to slay Aussie audiences. Anyone who's seen their incredible performance on the MTV Europe Music Awards knows we are in for a sonic and visual treat!

With an Antipodean following as large as the population of their native isle, Ireland's Snow Patrol return with an enchanting blend of pop genius that is nothing short of compelling.

No-one in their right mind would question the work ethic of Leeds quintet Kaiser Chiefs who having produced three albums in four years, have proven an ability to write more than one Festival anthem and will no doubt be welcomed by V Festival's very own truly Aussie mob.

Elbow received this year's Mercury Music Prize for their album The Seldom Seen Kid, and their beautiful take on indie melancholia continues to sustain their fanatic following on the live circuit.

With comparisons from Aretha to Dusty, Duffy's soulful tones have catapulted her album Rockferry reach to number one in a dozen countries - catch her Aussie debut here.

Named after the French King, Sandiego quartet Louis XIV will further bang the rock drum with their irresistible riffs and existentialist punk lyrics. Continuing the Gallic flavour of this musical General Assembly, also welcome THE DO, a new music sensation who draw from every genre of music, meld them together and thrill audiences with the eclectic avant-guarde result. To help you say it right, they take their name from the note-scale 'Do-Rei-Mi!

Rounding off the first announcement, Tame Impala's adolescent yet modern take on psychedelic rock will make kaleidoscopes cool again, and they are joined by other home grown heroes, The Temper Trap and Canyons.

Dome lineup details to come...


Ticket info:
*3-Day passes: $269.00 + $3 charity + applicable service fees, *Single Day Tickets: $99.00 + $1 charity + applicable service fees, *Camping tickets are $55 (+ applicable service charges)

History of Events
*10.6.08: Dates for Coachella '09 revealed, Buraka Som Sistema confirmed by Goldenvoice blog
*1.27.09: Lineup was to be announced on Kevin and Bean's morning show (KROQ) at 7:20AM PST. They revealed that the line-up announcement has been postponed.
*1.30.09A: Lineup posted at Coachella.com between 12-1AM.
*1.30.09B: Tickets go on sale at 9AM Tickets here
*2.10.09 Jenny Lewis moved from Sunday to Saturday
*2.24.09 The Murder City Devils were added to Sunday
*3.9.09 The Bomb Squad, Devendra Banhart, Flying Lotus, The Professionals, Kode 9, 6BLOCC, Daddy Kev, The Chemical Brothers, The Orb, Daedulus, Etienne de Crécy, Nocando, Busy P, Plump DJs, Gaslamp Killer VS DLX, Ras G & Samiym and MC Kemst added to the lineup. Adds were released through a new Zine called Coachella Digital. Download yours here.Also, Amy Winehouse cancelled.

event.title: ITAK Džafest z The Killers
event.description:
The Killers so turnejo Day & Age na povabilo Mobitela razširili tudi za slovenske »žrtve«, ki se ne morejo upreti hitom, kot so Somebody told me, Mr. Brithside, All these things I've done, When you were young in Human z zadnjega albuma Day & Age.

Nastop The Killersov v Sloveniji oznanja, da se v letu 2009 po letih premora koncertov svetovnih glasbenih zvezd slovenskim »glasbokuscem« obeta bogata glasbena letina.

Ob tem še vesela novica: Mobitel bo velik del vstopnic za koncert podaril svojim zvestim ITAK naročnikom in novim naročnikom paketa Itak Džabest, del vstopnic pa bodo naprodaj po džabest ceni 21,7 evrov.

Mentre si avvicina il momento del concerto del 17 marzo al Mediolanum Forum di Milano (andato esaurito in neanche due mesi) i The Killers annunciano un nuovo straordinario concerto in Italia nella stupenda cornice dell’Arena di Verona.

I The Killers hanno appena iniziato il tour europeo con l’esibizione del cantante Brandon Flowers ai Brit Awards assieme ai Pet Shop Boys e con un concerto alla Shepherd’s Bush Empire assieme ai Coldplay e con la speciale partecipazione di Bono degli U2.
Dopo l’enorme successo del singolo Human (al primo posto dei brani più suonati in radio) che ha spinto le vendite del nuovo album Day & Age a oltre 2.5 milioni, è stato appena lanciato il nuovo singolo Spaceman.


Il disco è stato prodotto da Stuart Price, una delle figure chiave della musica elettronica (Les Rhythmes Digitales) che aveva lavorato in precedenza coi The Killers in occasione del singolo “Don’t Shoot Me Santa” e su alcune canzoni della raccolta Sawdust, e già all’opera con Madonna e Missy Elliott.
L’album è preceduto dal singolo Human, già in programmazione sulle maggiori radio.

Con i due album in studio precendenti (Hot Fuss del 2004, che contiene la mega hit Somebody Told Me, e Sam’s Town del 2006) e la raccolta Sawdust (che contiene B sides, e rarità tra cui una canzone con Lou Reed, Tranquillize) i The Killers hanno venduto oltre 11 milioni di album riuscendo a coniugare profilo critico e successo commerciale.
La band è stata headliner di alcuni dei più prestigiosi festival rock del mondo tra cui Glastonbury, Reading, Pukkelpop, e si è esibita anche in venue storiche come il Madison Square Garden.

I Killers sono Brandon Flowers (voce), David Keuning (chitarra/tastiere), Mark Stoermer (basso) e Ronnie Vannucci (batteria).


Sito ufficiale:
www.thekillersmusic.com
www.myspace.com/thekillers




Il nuovo album Day & Age disponibile in tutti i negozi

event.title: B'ESTFEST "ZIUA ZERO" cu The Killers + Patrice
B'ESTFEST
event.description:
Third edition of the B'ESTFEST festival will take place on Romexpo grounds, in Bucharest , over a period of five days :1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 July 2009.

B'ESTFEST three day tickets (2, 3 and 4 July) cost 270 lei and are available only in presale in Diverta outlets and on MyTicket

The one day festival tickets are available on MyTicket and with January 27th they will also be put on sale in the Diverta stores, for ''Day Zero'', as well as for the three B`ESTFEST days.

The one day tickets are only available for the festival day for which they are bought (''Day Zero'', 2nd, 3rd or 4th of July) and they will be put on sale for the following prices: 110 lei, by April 1st; 130 lei during April 2nd - June 30th; 150 lei at the entrance, during the festival.

Schedule ( for now )

Day 0 - 1 July

- The Killers
- Thievery Corporation
- Patrice

Day 1 - 2 July

- Moby
- Motorhead
- Ayo

Day 2 - 3 July

- Orbital
- Franz Ferdinand
- Klaxons
- The Faint

Day 3 - 4 July

- Santana
- The Charlatans
- The Ting Tings

B`estfest Aftershock

event.title: Hultsfredsfestivalen
event.description: The Hultsfred Festival (Hultsfredsfestivalen in Swedish) is an annual music festival held in Hultsfred, Sweden. The festival is well known for its variety of genres and there are normally around 20 - 30 000 people attending.

event.title: Oxegen

artists.artist: Nick Cave and the Bad Seeds

event.description:
Oxegen is an annual music festival, held since 2004, sponsored by Heineken International. It was previously called Witnness, which ran from the year 2000 and was sponsored by Guinness. Oxegen was originally a two-day festival but for 2008 will be expanded to three days. It takes place at the Punchestown Racecourse in County Kildare, Republic of Ireland and has an average attendance of around 80,000 a day, with around half of these camping on site for the duration, and the rest travelling to the site each day. The festival is promoted by MCD.

While Oxegen has not yet reached the iconic status of Glastonbury, it still manages to attract a large quantity of high profile acts each year. Generally, the festival’s line-up is identical to that of T in the Park, which runs on the same weekend, but in Scotland. Many acts play Oxegen on the day that they’re not playing TitP.
As well as six stages of music, there are four large areas for camping which are subdivided by colour. Stalls and shops are also provided, as well as toilet and shower areas. The toilet facilities have been improved upon in recent years and are now adequate for the large number of people at the festival. There is also a funfair adjacent to the arena, featuring a big wheel and other rides, such as the “Magic Carpet”, the “Big Drop”, and the roller coaster.

event.title: Festival Internacional de Benicassim
event.description: Grande, muy GRANDE!!

event.title: FIB
event.description:
El tiempo sigue avanzando dentro de la historia del Festival y cada edición es un paso más en el emocionante universo de la música que se inició en 1995 y que continúa alimentando un fantástico viaje al sonido y la imaginación.

Año tras año, artistas y asistentes de todo el mundo han reflejado su pasión por la música haciendo de él una cita realmente ineludible. Porque de lo que se trata es de ser parte de una experiencia completamente única, en plenas vacaciones frente al mar, sintiendo la alegría de un verano especial. Y es que el Festival ya es un hecho cultural, un motor de iniciativas, propuestas y descubrimientos que sirve para vivir nuevas sensaciones.

Además de la música, que también se manifiesta en el ya necesario concurso de maquetas Proyecto Demo, hay espacios para otras disciplinas tales como la danza, la moda, el arte contemporáneo, el teatro y los cortometrajes, demostrando que la creatividad en el FIB Heineken fluye y se comunica a través del entusiasmo y la curiosidad.

El Festival y todo su equipo buscan trasladar una pasión que se traduce en varios días de alegría, convivencia, identidad e ilusión. Porque cada año trae consigo tantas canciones, imágenes y encuentros, que es necesario compartirlos con vosotros, escuchando vuestras opiniones y sugerencias, esperando el momento en el que se enciendan las luces de los escenarios y vuestras sonrisas y aplausos vuelvan a ser la esencia de un FIB Heineken que os aguarda con los altavoces listos para sonar.
